definition: a solid food prepared from the pressed curd of milk, to wind onto a cheese
details:
noun
- a solid food prepared from the pressed curd of milk
- erect or decumbent Old World perennial with axillary clusters of rosy-purple flowers
= synonyms: tall mallow, high mallow, cheeseflower
verb
- to wind onto a cheese
= example: to wind onto a cheese
- to get away, or stop it
= example: to get away, or stop it
